title: RIOT HELP ME PLZ
body: i need to know if i can create a account on pbe on euw i make the donwload of launcher in pbe but i cant crate account any1 help me plz and i am already lvl 30 in league ;__;{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
I checked your account and it doesn't look like you've signed up for PBE access yet. I recommend visiting this link to [sign up](https://pbesignup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).

We send invites out in batches, and look for players who are really active and are a positive influence on the community. Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for additional details.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
ive benn banned in chat 3 times this is  reason to i dont enter? ;_;
Well it certainly doesn't help, but continuing to play the game with a positive mindset and attitude definitely are ways to help you look more eligible for PBE access.

already tried to disable all or mutating all to not spoil the writing game but I think it only gets worse because then I have no communication with my team and as I am talking to a rioter I'll just ask if it is worthwhile or not, knowing that I already took 3 chat bans

I think taking a chance at something is always worthwhile, especially if it's a shot at the PBE. ^.^

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Targons can u answer me when i enter on pbe,just that ty for help
